summary: This bill, the Fueling Alternative Transportation with a Carbon Aviation Tax Act of 2025, aims to increase excise taxes on fuel used by private jets through amendments to the Internal Revenue Code. The increased tax revenue will fund the new Funding to Support Clean Communities Trust Fund, which will support grants and activities related to clean air initiatives, expanding public transit and passenger rail infrastructure, and improving public transportation in disadvantaged communities. The bill includes provisions for inflation adjustments and exemptions for certain uses, with an effective date of January 1, 2026.
